mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( username, password, email, name, career_type, edu_code, min_salary, job_codes, work_region_codes ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{careerType}, #{eduCode}, #{minSalary}, #{jobCodes}, #{workRegionCodes} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, NAME, CAREER_TYPE, EDU_CODE, MIN_SALARY, JOB_CODES, WORK_REGION_CODES, CREATED_AT FROM MEMBER WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
